name: Tongue Tale
description:
Leap, stick, and swing your way through the enchanting realms of Tongue Tale – a vibrant 2D platformer where you step into the webbed feet of a fearless blue frog!

Sticky Mechanics

Master the art of the tongue! Use it not just to snack flies, but also to cling to walls, swing over gaping chasms, and outplay your foes.

Vast Worlds Awaiting

Journey through 7 beautifully hand-crafted worlds, each bursting with unique challenges, secrets, and charming aesthetics.

Boss Battles

Confront and defeat 7 unforgettable bosses, each guarding their domain with unique skills and strategies. Test your wits and reflexes against these formidable foes.

Dark World

If you are looking for an extra challenge, play Dark World and climb the leaderboards.


Battle your friends and use all the movement techniques your tongue offers to you to outplay them.
Beat them in 80+ Minigames to get the crown!



Can you navigate the challenging terrains, overcome the daunting bosses, and prove that even a tiny frog can rise to hero status? Get ready for Tongue Tale!
